Title: Diaz - Don't Clean Up This Blood
Writer: Daniele Vicari (story), Daniele Vicari (screenplay), Laura Paolucci (screenplay), Alessandro Bandinelli (collaboration), Emanuele Scaringi (collaboration)
Actors: Claudio Santamaria, Jennifer Ulrich, Elio Germano, Davide Iacopini
Plot: A reenactment of the final days of the 2001 G8 Summit.
